author_id.description: The unique identifier of the author of the comment.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the comment was created.

html_url.description: The URL to access the comment in HTML format.

id.description: The unique identifier of the comment.

non_author_editor_id.description: The unique identifier of the non-author editor of the comment.

non_author_updated_at.description: The timestamp when the comment was last updated by a non-author editor.

official.description: Indicates if the comment is from an official source.

post_id.description: The unique identifier of the post to which the comment belongs.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the comment was last updated.

url.description: The URL to access the comment.

vote_count.description: The total count of votes the comment has received.

vote_sum.description: The sum of all votes (positive and negative) the comment has received.
